references.paper_title: Clinical-grade computational pathology using weakly supervised deep learning on whole slide images
references.reason: This paper is groundbreaking work in pathology AI, introducing the use of weakly-supervised learning to scale up machine learning for pathology.

references.paper_title: Scaling self-supervised learning for histopathology with masked image modeling
references.reason: This paper demonstrates remarkable capabilities of pathology foundation models and is among the first to explore self-supervised learning in the domain.

references.paper_title: Virchow: A million-slide digital pathology foundation model
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale pathology foundation model, demonstrating significant advancements in the field.

references.paper_title: Towards a general-purpose foundation model for computational pathology
references.reason: This paper explores the development of a general-purpose foundation model for pathology, improving the robustness and reliability of models.

references.paper_title: Phikon-v2, a large and public feature extractor for biomarker prediction
references.reason: This paper presents an improved version of a significant pathology model, improving upon previous capabilities and contributing to the field's advancement.
